00060 #define HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN \
00061   do { \
00062     DbTxn *txn = m_bdb_fs->start_transaction(); \
00063     try
00064 
00065 #define HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(_cb_) \
00066     catch (Exception &e) { \
00067       if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
00068         if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
00069           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00070         else \
00071           HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
00072         txn->abort(); \
00073         _cb_->error(e.code(), e.what()); \
00074         return; \
00075       } \
00076       HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
00077       poll(0, 0, (System::rand32() % 3000) + 1); \
00078       continue; \
00079     } \
00080     break; \
00081   } while (true)
00082 
00083 #define HT_BDBTXN_END(...) \
00084     catch (Exception &e) { \
00085       if (e.code() != Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_DEADLOCK) { \
00086         if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR) \
00087           HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END; \
00088         else \
00089           HT_WARNF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what()); \
00090         txn->abort(); \
00091         return __VA_ARGS__; \
00092       } \
00093       HT_WARN("Berkeley DB deadlock encountered"); \
00094       poll(0, 0, (System::rand32() % 3000) + 1); \
00095       continue; \
00096     } \
00097     break; \
00098   } while (true)

00107 Master::Master(ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_mgr, PropertiesPtr &props,
00108                ServerKeepaliveHandlerPtr &keepalive_handler,
00109                ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue_ptr)
00110     : m_verbose(false), m_next_handle_number(1), m_next_session_id(1) {
00111 
00112   m_verbose = props->get_bool("verbose");
00113   m_lease_interval = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.Lease.Interval");
00114   m_keep_alive_interval = props->get_i32("Hyperspace.KeepAlive.Interval");
00115 
00116   Path base_dir(props->get_str("Hyperspace.Master.Dir"));
00117 
00118   if (!base_dir.is_complete())
00119     base_dir = Path(System::install_dir) / base_dir;
00120 
00121   m_base_dir = base_dir.directory_string();
00122 
00123   HT_INFOF("BerkeleyDB base directory = '%s'", m_base_dir.c_str());
00124 
00125   if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00126     HT_WARNF("Unable to open base directory '%s' - %s - will create.",
00127              m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00128     if (!FileUtils::mkdirs(m_base_dir.c_str())) {
00129       HT_ERRORF("Unable to create base directory %s - %s",
00130                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00131       exit(1);
00132     }
00133     if ((m_base_fd = ::open(m_base_dir.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00134       HT_ERRORF("Unable to open base directory %s - %s",
00135                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00136       exit(1);
00137     }
00138   }
00139 
00143   if (flock(m_base_fd, LOCK_EX | LOCK_NB) != 0) {
00144     if (errno == EWOULDBLOCK) {
00145       HT_ERRORF("Base directory '%s' is locked by another process.",
00146                 m_base_dir.c_str());
00147     }
00148     else {
00149       HT_ERRORF("Unable to lock base directory '%s' - %s",
00150                 m_base_dir.c_str(), strerror(errno));
00151     }
00152     exit(1);
00153   }
00154 
00155   m_bdb_fs = new BerkeleyDbFilesystem(m_base_dir);
00156 
00160   get_generation_number();
00161 
00162   NodeDataPtr root_node = new NodeData();
00163   root_node->name = "/";
00164   m_node_map["/"] = root_node;
00165 
00166   uint16_t port = props->get_i16("Hyperspace.Master.Port");
00167   InetAddr::initialize(&m_local_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00168 
00169   app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue( get_i32("workers") );
00170 
00171   m_keepalive_handler_ptr.reset(
00172    new ServerKeepaliveHandler(conn_mgr->get_comm(), this, app_queue_ptr));
00173   keepalive_handler = m_keepalive_handler_ptr;
00174 }

00177 Master::~Master() {
00178   delete m_bdb_fs;
00179   ::close(m_base_fd);
00180 }

00183 uint64_t Master::create_session(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00184   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00185   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00186   uint64_t session_id = m_next_session_id++;
00187   session_data = new SessionData(addr, m_lease_interval, session_id);
00188   m_session_map[session_id] = session_data;
00189   m_session_heap.push_back(session_data);
00190   return session_id;
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 bool Master::get_session(uint64_t session_id, SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00195   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00196   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00197   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00198     return false;
00199   session_data = (*iter).second;
00200   return true;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void Master::destroy_session(uint64_t session_id) {
00204   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00205   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00206   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00207   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00208     return;
00209   session_data = (*iter).second;
00210   m_session_map.erase(session_id);
00211   session_data->expire();
00212   // force it to top of expiration heap
00213   boost::xtime_get(&session_data->expire_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 int Master::renew_session_lease(uint64_t session_id) {
00218   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00219 
00220   SessionMap::iterator iter = m_session_map.find(session_id);
00221   if (iter == m_session_map.end())
00222     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00223 
00224   if (!(*iter).second->renew_lease())
00225     return Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION;
00226 
00227   return Error::OK;
00228 }
00229 
00230 bool Master::next_expired_session(SessionDataPtr &session_data) {
00231   ScopedLock lock(m_session_map_mutex);
00232   struct LtSessionData ascending;
00233   boost::xtime now;
00234 
00235   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00236 
00237   if (m_session_heap.size() > 0) {
00238     std::make_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00239     if (m_session_heap[0]->is_expired(now)) {
00240       session_data = m_session_heap[0];
00241       std::pop_heap(m_session_heap.begin(), m_session_heap.end(), ascending);
00242       m_session_heap.resize(m_session_heap.size()-1);
00243       m_session_map.erase(session_data->id);
00244       return true;
00245     }
00246   }
00247   return false;
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00254 void Master::remove_expired_sessions() {
00255   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00256   int error;
00257   std::string errmsg;
00258   std::set<uint64_t> handles;
00259 
00260   while (next_expired_session(session_data)) {
00261     if (m_verbose)
00262       HT_INFOF("Expiring session %llu", (Llu)session_data->id);
00263     session_data->expire(handles);
00264   }
00265 
00266   foreach(uint64_t handle, handles) {
00267     if (m_verbose)
00268       HT_INFOF("Destroying handle %llu", (Llu)handle);
00269     if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg, false))
00270       HT_ERRORF("Problem destroying handle - %s (%s)",
00271                 Error::get_text(error), errmsg.c_str());
00272   }
00273 
00274 }

00280 void Master::create_handle(uint64_t *handlep, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00281   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00282   *handlep = ++m_next_handle_number;
00283   handle_data = new HandleData();
00284   handle_data->id = *handlep;
00285   handle_data->locked = false;
00286   m_handle_map[*handlep] = handle_data;
00287 }
00288 
00292 bool Master::get_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00293   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00294   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00295   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00296     return false;
00297   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00298   return true;
00299 }
00300 
00304 bool Master::remove_handle_data(uint64_t handle, HandleDataPtr &handle_data) {
00305   ScopedLock lock(m_handle_map_mutex);
00306   HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00307   if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00308     return false;
00309   handle_data = (*iter).second;
00310   m_handle_map.erase(iter);
00311   return true;
00312 }

00320 void
00321 Master::mkdir(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00322   std::string abs_name;
00323   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00324   std::string child_name;
00325 
00326   if (m_verbose) {
00327     HT_INFOF("mkdir(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00328   }
00329 
00330   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00331     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "directory '/' exists");
00332     return;
00333   }
00334 
00335   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00336 
00337   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00338     ScopedLock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00339 
00340     m_bdb_fs->mkdir(txn, name);
00341 
00342     txn->commit(0);
00343 
00344     // deliver event notifications
00345     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00346                                             child_name));
00347     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00348   }
00349   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00350 
00351   cb->response_ok();
00352 }

00359 void
00360 Master::unlink(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name) {
00361   std::string child_name;
00362   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00363   NodeDataPtr node;
00364 
00365   if (m_verbose) {
00366     HT_INFOF("unlink(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00367   }
00368 
00369   if (!strcmp(name, "/")) {
00370     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_PERMISSION_DENIED,
00371               "Cannot remove '/' directory");
00372     return;
00373   }
00374 
00375   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name)) {
00376     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00377     return;
00378   }
00379 
00380   get_node(name, node);
00381   {
00382     boost::mutex::scoped_lock node_lock(node->mutex);
00383     if (node->reference_count() > 0) {
00384       cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_OPEN,
00385                 "Reference count > 0");
00386       return;
00387     }
00388   }
00389 
00390   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00391 
00392   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00393     ScopedLock node_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00394 
00395     m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, name);
00396 
00397     txn->commit(0);
00398 
00399     // deliver event notifications
00400     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
00401                                                 child_name));
00402     deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event_ptr);
00403   }
00404   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00405 
00406   cb->response_ok();
00407 }

00410 
00414 void
00415 Master::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, uint64_t session_id, const char *name,
00416     uint32_t flags, uint32_t event_mask, std::vector<Attribute> &init_attrs) {
00417   std::string child_name;
00418   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00419   NodeDataPtr node_data;
00420   NodeDataPtr parent_node;
00421   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00422   bool created = false;
00423   bool is_dir = false;
00424   bool existed;
00425   uint64_t handle;
00426   bool lock_notifiy = false;
00427   uint32_t lock_mode = 0;
00428   uint64_t lock_generation = 0;
00429   bool create_notification_delivered = false;
00430 
00431   if (m_verbose) {
00432     HT_INFOF("open(session_id=%llu, fname=%s, flags=0x%x, event_mask=0x%x)",
00433              (Llu)session_id, name, flags, event_mask);
00434   }
00435 
00436   assert(name[0] == '/');
00437 
00438   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00439     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00440 
00441   if (!find_parent_node(name, parent_node, child_name))
00442     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00443 
00444   if (!init_attrs.empty() && !(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00445     HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_CREATE_FAILED,
00446              "initial attributes can only be supplied on CREATE");
00447 
00448   // If path name to open is "/", then create a dummy NodeData object for
00449   // the parent because the previous call will return the node itself as
00450   // the parent, causing the second of the following two mutex locks to hang
00451   if (!strcmp(name, "/"))
00452     parent_node = new NodeData();
00453 
00454   get_node(name, node_data);
00455 
00456   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00457     ScopedLock parent_lock(parent_node->mutex);
00458     ScopedLock node_lock(node_data->mutex);
00459 
00460     if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_SHARED) {
00461       if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0)
00462         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00463       lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00464       if (node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00465         lock_notifiy = true;
00466     }
00467     else if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) == OPEN_FLAG_LOCK_EXCLUSIVE) {
00468       if (node_data->exclusive_lock_handle != 0 ||
00469           !node_data->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00470         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_LOCK_CONFLICT, "");
00471       lock_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00472       lock_notifiy = true;
00473     }
00474 
00475     existed = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name, &is_dir);
00476 
00477     if (existed) {
00478       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE) && (flags & OPEN_FLAG_EXCL))
00479         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "mode=CREATE|EXCL");
00480 
00481       if ((flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP))
00482         HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, "Unable to open TEMP file "
00483                   "'%s' because it already exists", name);
00484       // Read/create 'lock.generation' attribute
00485       if (node_data->lock_generation == 0) {
00486         if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00487                                      &node_data->lock_generation)) {
00488           node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00489           m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00490                                   node_data->lock_generation);
00491         }
00492       }
00493     }
00494     else {
00495       if (!(flags & OPEN_FLAG_CREATE))
00496         HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, name);
00497 
00498       m_bdb_fs->create(txn, name, (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP));
00499       node_data->lock_generation = 1;
00500       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00501                               node_data->lock_generation);
00502       // Set the initial attributes
00503       for (size_t i=0; i<init_attrs.size(); i++)
00504         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, name, init_attrs[i].name,
00505                             init_attrs[i].value, init_attrs[i].value_len);
00506       if (flags & OPEN_FLAG_TEMP)
00507         node_data->ephemeral = true;
00508       created = true;
00509     }
00510 
00511     if (!handle_data)
00512       create_handle(&handle, handle_data);
00513 
00514     handle_data->node = node_data.get();
00515     handle_data->open_flags = flags;
00516     handle_data->event_mask = event_mask;
00517     handle_data->session_data = session_data;
00518 
00519     session_data->add_handle(handle);
00520 
00521     if (created && !create_notification_delivered) {
00522       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_ADDED,
00523                                               child_name));
00524       deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event);
00525       create_notification_delivered = true;
00526     }
00527 
00531     if (lock_mode != 0) {
00532       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00533       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, name, "lock.generation",
00534                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00535       lock_generation = handle_data->node->lock_generation;
00536       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = lock_mode;
00537 
00538       lock_handle(handle_data, lock_mode);
00539 
00540       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00541       if (lock_notifiy) {
00542         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(lock_mode));
00543         deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00544       }
00545     }
00546 
00547     handle_data->node->add_handle(handle, handle_data);
00548 
00549     txn->commit(0);
00550   }
00551   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00552 
00553   cb->response(handle, created, lock_generation);
00554 }
00555 
00556 
00560 void Master::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00561   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00562   int error;
00563   std::string errmsg;
00564   size_t n;
00565 
00566   if (m_verbose) {
00567     HT_INFOF("close(session=%llu, handle=%llu)", (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00568   }
00569 
00570   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00571     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00572     return;
00573   }
00574 
00575   {
00576     ScopedLock slock(session_data->mutex);
00577     n = session_data->handles.erase(handle);
00578   }
00579 
00580   if (n) {
00581     if (!destroy_handle(handle, &error, errmsg)) {
00582       cb->error(error, errmsg);
00583       return;
00584     }
00585   }
00586 
00587   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK) {
00588     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00589   }
00590 }

00593 
00597 void
00598 Master::attr_set(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00599                  const char *name, const void *value, size_t value_len) {
00600   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00601   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00602   int error;
00603 
00604   if (m_verbose) {
00605     HT_INFOF("attrset(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s, value_len=%d)",
00606              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name, (int)value_len);
00607   }
00608 
00609   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00610     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00611 
00612   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00613     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00614 
00615   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00616     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00617 
00618     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, value, value_len);
00619 
00620     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_SET, name));
00621     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00622 
00623     txn->commit(0);
00624   }
00625   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00626 
00627   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00628     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00629 }
00630 
00631 
00635 void
00636 Master::attr_get(ResponseCallbackAttrGet *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00637                  uint64_t handle, const char *name) {
00638   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00639   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00640   int error;
00641   DynamicBuffer dbuf;
00642 
00643   if (m_verbose)
00644     HT_INFOF("attrget(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00645              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00646 
00647   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00648     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00649 
00650   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00651     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00652 
00653   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00654     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00655 
00656     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name, dbuf))
00657       HT_THROW(Error::HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND, name);
00658 
00659     txn->commit(0);
00660   }
00661   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00662 
00663   StaticBuffer buffer(dbuf);
00664 
00665   if ((error = cb->response(buffer)) != Error::OK)
00666     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00667 }
00668 
00669 
00670 void
00671 Master::attr_del(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00672                  const char *name) {
00673   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00674   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00675   int error;
00676 
00677   if (m_verbose)
00678     HT_INFOF("attrdel(session=%llu, handle=%llu, name=%s)",
00679              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, name);
00680 
00681   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00682     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00683 
00684   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00685     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00686 
00687 
00688   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00689     ScopedLock node_lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00690 
00691     m_bdb_fs->del_xattr(txn, handle_data->node->name, name);
00692 
00693     HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_ATTR_DEL, name));
00694     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event);
00695 
00696     txn->commit(0);
00697   }
00698   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00699 
00700   if ((error = cb->response_ok()) != Error::OK)
00701     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00702 }
00703 
00704 
00705 void
00706 Master::exists(ResponseCallbackExists *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00707                const char *name) {
00708   int error;
00709   bool file_exists;
00710 
00711   if (m_verbose)
00712     HT_INFOF("exists(session_id=%llu, name=%s)", (Llu)session_id, name);
00713 
00714   assert(name[0] == '/' && name[strlen(name)-1] != '/');
00715 
00716   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00717     file_exists = m_bdb_fs->exists(txn, name);
00718     txn->commit(0);
00719   }
00720   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00721 
00722   if ((error = cb->response(file_exists)) != Error::OK)
00723     HT_ERRORF("Problem sending back response - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00724 }

00727 void
00728 Master::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, uint64_t session_id,
00729                 uint64_t handle) {
00730   std::string abs_name;
00731   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00732   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00733   DirEntry dentry;
00734   std::vector<DirEntry> listing;
00735 
00736   if (m_verbose)
00737     HT_INFOF("readdir(session=%llu, handle=%llu)",
00738              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00739 
00740   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data))
00741     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "%llu", (Llu)session_id);
00742 
00743   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data))
00744     HT_THROWF(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE, "handle=%llu", (Llu)handle);
00745 
00746 
00747   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00748     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00749     m_bdb_fs->get_directory_listing(txn, handle_data->node->name, listing);
00750     txn->commit(0);
00751   }
00752   HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00753 
00754   cb->response(listing);
00755 }
00756 
00757 
00758 void
00759 Master::lock(ResponseCallbackLock *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle,
00760              uint32_t mode, bool try_lock) {
00761   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00762   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00763   bool notify = true;
00764 
00765   if (m_verbose) {
00766     HT_INFOF("lock(session=%llu, handle=%llu, mode=0x%x, try_lock=%d)",
00767              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle, mode, try_lock);
00768   }
00769 
00770   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00771     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00772     return;
00773   }
00774 
00775   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00776     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00777               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00778     return;
00779   }
00780 
00781   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_LOCK)) {
00782     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00783               "handle not open for locking");
00784     return;
00785   }
00786 
00787   if (!(handle_data->open_flags & OPEN_FLAG_WRITE)) {
00788     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_MODE_RESTRICTION,
00789               "handle not open for writing");
00790     return;
00791   }
00792 
00793   {
00794     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00795     NodeData::LockRequestList &pending_lock_reqs =
00796         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs;
00797 
00798     if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00799       if (try_lock)
00800         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00801       else {
00802         pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00803         cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00804       }
00805       return;
00806     }
00807     else if (handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED) {
00808       if (mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00809         if (try_lock)
00810           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00811         else {
00812           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00813           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00814         }
00815         return;
00816       }
00817 
00818       assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED);
00819 
00820       if (!pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00821         if (try_lock)
00822           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_BUSY);
00823         else {
00824           pending_lock_reqs.push_back(LockRequest(handle, mode));
00825           cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_PENDING);
00826         }
00827         return;
00828       }
00829     }
00830 
00831     // at this point we're OK to acquire the lock
00832     if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED &&
00833         !handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty())
00834       notify = false;
00835 
00836     handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00837 
00838     HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00839       m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
00840                               handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00841       txn->commit(0);
00842     }
00843     HT_BDBTXN_END_CB(cb);
00844 
00845     handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = mode;
00846     lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00847 
00848     // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00849     if (notify) {
00850       HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockAcquired(mode));
00851       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr);
00852     }
00853 
00854     cb->response(LOCK_STATUS_GRANTED, handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00855   }
00856 }
00857 
00861 void Master::lock_handle(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, uint32_t mode) {
00862   if (mode == LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00863     handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.insert(handle_data->id);
00864   else {
00865     assert(mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE);
00866     handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = handle_data->id;
00867   }
00868   handle_data->locked = true;
00869 }
00870 
00874 void
00875 Master::lock_handle_with_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
00876                                       uint32_t mode, bool wait_for_notify) {
00877   lock_handle(handle_data, mode);
00878 
00879   // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00880   HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockGranted(mode,
00881                            handle_data->node->lock_generation));
00882   deliver_event_notification(handle_data, event, wait_for_notify);
00883 }
00884 
00885 
00886 
00890 void
00891 Master::release(ResponseCallback *cb, uint64_t session_id, uint64_t handle) {
00892   SessionDataPtr session_data;
00893   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
00894 
00895   if (m_verbose) {
00896     HT_INFOF("release(session=%llu, handle=%llu)",
00897              (Llu)session_id, (Llu)handle);
00898   }
00899 
00900   if (!get_session(session_id, session_data)) {
00901     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_EXPIRED_SESSION, "");
00902     return;
00903   }
00904 
00905   if (!get_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
00906     cb->error(Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE,
00907               std::string("handle=") + handle);
00908     return;
00909   }
00910 
00911   release_lock(handle_data);
00912 
00913   cb->response_ok();
00914 }
00915 
00916 
00917 void Master::release_lock(HandleDataPtr &handle_data, bool wait_for_notify) {
00918   ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
00919   vector<HandleDataPtr> next_lock_handles;
00920   int next_mode = 0;
00921 
00922   if (handle_data->locked) {
00923     if (handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle != 0) {
00924       assert(handle_data->id == handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle);
00925       handle_data->node->exclusive_lock_handle = 0;
00926     }
00927     else {
00928       unsigned int count = handle_data->node->
00929           shared_lock_handles.erase(handle_data->id);
00930       HT_ASSERT(count);
00931     }
00932     handle_data->locked = false;
00933   }
00934   else
00935     return;
00936 
00937   // deliver LOCK_RELEASED notifications if no more locks held on node
00938   if (handle_data->node->shared_lock_handles.empty()) {
00939     HT_INFO("About to deliver lock released notifications");
00940     HyperspaceEventPtr event_ptr(new EventLockReleased());
00941     deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event_ptr, wait_for_notify);
00942     HT_INFO("Finished delivering lock released notifications");
00943   }
00944 
00945   handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = 0;
00946 
00947   if (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty()) {
00948     HandleDataPtr next_handle;
00949     const LockRequest &front_lock_req = handle_data->node->
00950         pending_lock_reqs.front();
00951     if (front_lock_req.mode == LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE) {
00952       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_EXCLUSIVE;
00953       if (get_handle_data(front_lock_req.handle, next_handle))
00954         next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
00955       handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
00956     }
00957     else {
00958       next_mode = LOCK_MODE_SHARED;
00959       do {
00960         const LockRequest &lockreq = handle_data->node->
00961             pending_lock_reqs.front();
00962         if (lockreq.mode != LOCK_MODE_SHARED)
00963           break;
00964         if (get_handle_data(lockreq.handle, next_handle))
00965           next_lock_handles.push_back(next_handle);
00966         handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.pop_front();
00967       } while (!handle_data->node->pending_lock_reqs.empty());
00968     }
00969 
00970     if (!next_lock_handles.empty()) {
00971       handle_data->node->lock_generation++;
00972 
00973       HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
00974         m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i64(txn, handle_data->node->name, "lock.generation",
00975                                 handle_data->node->lock_generation);
00976         txn->commit(0);
00977       }
00978       HT_BDBTXN_END();
00979 
00980       handle_data->node->cur_lock_mode = next_mode;
00981 
00982       for (size_t i=0; i<next_lock_handles.size(); i++) {
00983         assert(handle_data->id != next_lock_handles[i]->id);
00984         lock_handle_with_notification(next_lock_handles[i], next_mode,
00985                                       wait_for_notify);
00986       }
00987 
00988       // deliver notification to handles to this same node
00989       HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventLockAcquired(next_mode));
00990       deliver_event_notifications(handle_data->node, event, wait_for_notify);
00991     }
00992   }
00993 }
00994 
00995 
00999 void
01000 Master::deliver_event_notifications(NodeData *node,
01001     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01002   int notifications = 0;
01003 
01004   // log event
01005   for (HandleMap::iterator iter = node->handle_map.begin();
01006        iter != node->handle_map.end(); ++iter) {
01007     /*
01008     HT_DEBUGF("Delivering notification (%d == %d)", (*iter).second->event_mask,
01009               event_ptr->get_mask());
01010     */
01011     if ((*iter).second->event_mask & event_ptr->get_mask()) {
01012       (*iter).second->session_data->add_notification(
01013           new Notification((*iter).first, event_ptr));
01014       m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01015           (*iter).second->session_data->id);
01016       notifications++;
01017     }
01018   }
01019 
01020   if (wait_for_notify && notifications)
01021     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01022 }
01023 
01024 
01028 void
01029 Master::deliver_event_notification(HandleDataPtr &handle_data,
01030     HyperspaceEventPtr &event_ptr, bool wait_for_notify) {
01031 
01032   // log event
01033   handle_data->session_data->add_notification(
01034       new Notification(handle_data->id, event_ptr));
01035   m_keepalive_handler_ptr->deliver_event_notifications(
01036       handle_data->session_data->id);
01037 
01038   if (wait_for_notify)
01039     event_ptr->wait_for_notifications();
01040 
01041 }
01042 
01043 
01044 
01048 bool
01049 Master::find_parent_node(const std::string &normal_name,
01050                          NodeDataPtr &parent_node, std::string &child_name) {
01051   NodeMap::iterator node_it;
01052   size_t last_slash = normal_name.rfind("/", normal_name.length());
01053 
01054   child_name.clear();
01055 
01056   if (last_slash > 0) {
01057     ScopedLock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01058     std::string parent_name(normal_name, 0, last_slash);
01059     child_name.append(normal_name, last_slash + 1,
01060                       normal_name.length() - last_slash - 1);
01061     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01062 
01063     if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01064       parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01065     else {
01066       parent_node = new NodeData();
01067       parent_node->name = parent_name;
01068       m_node_map[parent_name] = parent_node;
01069     }
01070     return true;
01071   }
01072   else if (last_slash == 0) {
01073     ScopedLock lock(m_node_map_mutex);
01074     std::string parent_name = "/";
01075     node_it = m_node_map.find(parent_name);
01076     assert (node_it != m_node_map.end());
01077     child_name.append(normal_name, 1, normal_name.length() - 1);
01078     parent_node = (*node_it).second;
01079     return true;
01080   }
01081 
01082   return false;
01083 }
01084 
01085 
01089 bool
01090 Master::destroy_handle(uint64_t handle, int *errorp, std::string &errmsg,
01091                        bool wait_for_notify) {
01092   HandleDataPtr handle_data;
01093   unsigned int refcount = 0;
01094 
01095   if (!remove_handle_data(handle, handle_data)) {
01096     *errorp = Error::HYPERSPACE_INVALID_HANDLE;
01097     errmsg = std::string("handle=") + handle;
01098     return false;
01099   }
01100 
01101   {
01102     ScopedLock lock(handle_data->node->mutex);
01103 
01104     handle_data->node->remove_handle(handle_data->id);
01105     refcount = handle_data->node->reference_count();
01106   }
01107 
01108   release_lock(handle_data, wait_for_notify);
01109 
01110   if (refcount == 0) {
01111 
01112     if (handle_data->node->ephemeral) {
01113       std::string child_name;
01114       NodeDataPtr parent_node;
01115 
01116       if (find_parent_node(handle_data->node->name, parent_node, child_name)) {
01117         HyperspaceEventPtr event(new EventNamed(EVENT_MASK_CHILD_NODE_REMOVED,
01118                                                 child_name));
01119         deliver_event_notifications(parent_node.get(), event, wait_for_notify);
01120       }
01121 
01122       // remove file from database
01123       HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01124         m_bdb_fs->unlink(txn, handle_data->node->name);
01125         txn->commit(0);
01126       }
01127       HT_BDBTXN_END(false);
01128 
01129       // remove node
01130       NodeMap::iterator node_it = m_node_map.find(handle_data->node->name);
01131 
01132       if (node_it != m_node_map.end())
01133         m_node_map.erase(node_it);
01134     }
01135   }
01136 
01137   return true;
01138 }
01139 
01140 
01143 void Master::get_generation_number() {
01144 
01145   HT_BDBTXN_BEGIN {
01146     if (!m_bdb_fs->get_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01147                                  &m_generation))
01148       m_generation = 0;
01149 
01150     m_generation++;
01151     m_bdb_fs->set_xattr_i32(txn, "/hyperspace/metadata", "generation",
01152                             m_generation);
01153     txn->commit(0);
01154   }
01155   HT_BDBTXN_END();
01156 }
